headline: The reality check everyone’s ignoring
summary: Welcome to Today’s Smart Money Roundup. Software stocks are getting crushed, and Barron’s is calling it “overdone.” Salesforce (CRM) is down 27% over the past year despite Wall Street hyping its Agentforce AI platform as a “medium-term growth engine.” The stock’s at $233.54, down 10.4% in just the past week. Snowflake (SNOW) fell 7.1% this ... The reality check everyone’s ignoring

headline: UBS Raises Price Target on Vistra (VST) to $233 After Meta Nuclear Power Deal
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks on Wall Street. On January 12, UBS analyst William Appicelli raised the price target on the stock to $233.00 (from $230.00) while maintaining a “Buy” rating. Firm analysts see robust cash accretion from nuclear PPAs with META, citing 20-year cash flow visibility and record-high capacity […]

headline: BofA Maintains Buy on META, Sees No Material 2026 Expense Impact From Energy Deals
summary: Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) is one of the Must-Watch AI Stocks on Wall Street. On January 12, BofA Securities analyst Justin Post reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with an $810.00 price target. Firm analysts view recent energy deals for Meta as strategic, anticipating no significant impact on 2026 expenses. BofA noted how Meta announced […]
